amendment.description: To provide for a report on the recruitment and retention of individuals with foreign language skills.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3414 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3414 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S7137) To provide for a report on the recruitment and retention of individuals with foreign language skills.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3414 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3414 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Akaka.
